name: @junctionrelay/shader-x-ray
description: Medical radiograph — luma inversion, Sobel edge bone-glow, density heatmap, film grain, lightbox frame

junctionrelay.description: Authentic radiograph simulation. Luma inversion maps density to X-ray opacity, Sobel edge detection creates bright structural outlines like bone boundaries, dense regions get a faint orange-red hotspot tint, cool blue-tinted film base with lightbox backlight glow at centre, coarse film grain, digitiser scanline artifact, and a physical lightbox frame edge. Fully self-contained.
